description: Ivory-colored plunge balconette bra with French lace

core:description.text: An exquisite ivory-colored plunge balconette bra featuring delicate French lace. The balconette design creates a naturally rounded shape while the plunging neckline offers an alluring décolletage. Intricate lace detailing adds a touch of romance and elegance, with underwire support ensuring both comfort and lift throughout the day.
